result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Sir Tony Valentino Conley

records.addlTxt:
- AMENDED

- Includes 22CM511, 21CM92 & and 22CF716

- It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, T.E.K. or N.E. except for Child Exchange through a 3rd party .  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

11:22 AM Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: C. Dillon via zoom, Clerk: B Harris, Defendant Sir Tony Valentino Conley in court without counsel.  Attorney Aaron M. Damrau in court for State of Wisconsin. Includes 21CM92(STC), 22CF716 (INIT), & 22CM511 (STC).  Court reviews file and notes off record discussion with DE regarding status of an attorney, DE to send PD's office income information.  Court informs def of charges and reschedules this matter to conduct INIT when an attorney is present.  Court orders bond only.  DE verified address and updates phone number.  Bond continues. Adjourned at 11:27 AM. bph
Initial appearance on November 23, 2022 at 03:15 pm.
